EmailTemplate.description: Used by the bulk macro to mass-update customers affected by billing error issues.
EmailTemplate.name: Case Update: Billing Error
EmailTemplate.subject: An update from {!Organization.Name} on Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for contacting us regarding your issue "{!Case.Subject}". We have recently upgraded our billing system, which appears to be the cause of these errors. We are still investigating the root cause and will provide you an update as soon as the issue is resolved.
If you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to reply to this email or add comments to your case in the {!Organization.Name} Community.
We hope this update is helpful and thanks for your patience as we work to resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Sincerely, {!Organization.Name} Customer Service
Case Reference ID: {!Case.Thread_Id}
